Description: Body sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed black with single band in added white; exterior: painted decoration consisting of sphinx (part of curlicue and wing remaining) to left.
Curator's comments: For parallels regarding the decoration, see Alexandria no. 17162.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0900) (phase 2)
